message.body: Hey! How are you and Louis?
I saw that and my signed copy should be on its way to you. Sorry it took a while. And Florida is awesome.
Doing good! It's been frozen/snowy but we got some good rides in - went for a long hack last weekend & he seemed to like that. Btw, I sent a slightly modified lease back to you. Hope Florida's nice!
Oh good! I also owe you for board this month - just let me know if you want me to mail a check, or wait til you get back, whatever works. Thanks!
Would you be able to pay Tanya directly?
Definitely! For some reason I assumed you paid the whole board - sorry about that. I'll take care of it with Tanya for sure.
